page.title: 18Attitudes in Woburn 2
page.content: {Attitudes to Entertainment {Old people}in the town think that there is enough entertainment in Woburn for them but there should be more for younger people. In their spare time old people like walking and gardening. In the age group{17-30 people seem to make more use of the available facilities. In their spare time they swim, play golf, walk and socialise in the local pubs. These people and a few old people also think that a{sports hall}is greatly needed. The middle aged people don't seem to use the facilities available much. In their spare time they like to walk, swim, shop and ride horses. These people also think that there are too many pubs. Many of the young people think that there are too many old people and that the place needs livening up.
